name: Eve of Destruction - REDUX VIETNAM
description: Eve of Destruction is a First-Person-Shooter for PC about the Vietnam War era. The game is constantly evolving.
minimum_requirements: OS: 32 Bit Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2,8 GHZ Dual Core Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics 512 MB VRAM (medium-class) DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: required Additional Notes: Upgrading to a 64 Bit OS is strongly recommended!
recommended_requirements: OS: 64 Bit Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 3,4 GHz Quad Core or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics 2048 VRAM (medium- or upper-class) DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: required
